title: Semantic Co-Speech Gesture Synthesis and Real-Time Control for Humanoid Robots
summary: We present an innovative end-to-end framework for synthesizing semantically meaningful co-speech gestures and deploying them in real-time on a humanoid robot. This system addresses the challenge of creating natural, expressive non-verbal communication for robots by integrating advanced gesture generation techniques with robust physical control.
